Detailed Description

The AudioNode class allows to capture audio data with the microphone array of a given camera device.

Member Function Documentation

bool DepthSense::AudioNode::configurationIsReadOnly ( )

Checks whether property AudioNode::configuration is read-only.

The AudioNode::configuration property specifies the configuration of the audio node.

Exceptions
DepthSense::InvalidOperationExceptionthe node no longer exists
Returns
whether property AudioNode::configuration is read-only
See also
setConfiguration()
Exceptions
DepthSense::TransportExceptiona network or protocol error has occurred
std::bad_allocnot enough memory to perform the requested operation

void DepthSense::AudioNode::setConfiguration ( DepthSense::AudioNode::Configuration  value)

Sets the value of the AudioNode::configuration property.

The AudioNode::configuration property specifies the configuration of the audio node.

Exceptions
DepthSense::InvalidOperationExceptionthe node no longer exists
Parameters
valuethe value to set
See also
getConfiguration(), configurationIsReadOnly()
Exceptions
DepthSense::UnauthorizedAccessExceptionthe parent context does not have control of the current node
DepthSense::ArgumentExceptionthe provided configuration is invalid
DepthSense::ConfigurationExceptionthe provided configuration is valid but failed to apply
DepthSense::StreamingExceptionstreaming was enabled at the time of the call and could not be restarted because of a device or software error
DepthSense::TransportExceptiona network or protocol error has occurred
std::bad_allocnot enough memory to perform the requested operation
